Header: Three Brigades in Mannar Launch Dengue Prevention Programmes
Content: On directions given by the Army Headquarters, troops of 541, 542 and 543 Brigades of the 54 Division in Mannar under the supervision of respective Brigade Commanders and Brigadier W. G. H. S Bandara, General Officer Commanding 54 Division separately participated in Dengue prevention programmes in selected schools in Mannar area. The programmes were conducted during 1-2 September 2018 prior to the commencement of the third term of the schools. Mote similar programmes are scheduled to be held in other schools in Mannar district in future.
